text:
Oh you draw on top of 3D models ??? Thats awesome.....  
It does sound quite fast paced to be fair but the whole process does sound quite fun ! Do you ever get overloaded with work ? And if so how do you manage ? ( i'm very bad at organisation to be quite honest hahaha )

 And do you do a  lot of real life studies outside of production ??? 

Btw i wanted to know if you have any good books regarding like art in general, wether its about environments, painting or just anything you found helpful or/and interesting ??
